Keeley Hawes cut a chic figure as she attended a screening of her show The Midwich Cuckoos in London on Tuesday night.

articles.title: The chart history of Kate Bush's viral Stranger Things hit Running Up That Hill (A Deal With God) - Official Charts Company
articles.description: The lead single from Bush's landmark fifth album Hounds of Love, Running Up That Hill shows one of Britain's true pop auteurs at the height of her powers.
articles.content: Kate Bush is undoubtedly one of the most singular talent to ever emerge from British pop music. An auteur in the truest sense, Bush's music is as unwieldy and ever-shifting like this wind; never cont… [+3532 chars]

articles.title: Ed Sheeran pauses concert mid-song to stop fight at Principality Stadium - Wales Online
articles.description: The footage, which was shared by devlinogorman1 on TikTok, shows him performing one of his most popular songs until an alleged altercation in the crowd catches his attention
articles.content: A video has emerged showing musician Ed Sheeran pausing mid-performance after a fight broke out in the crowd during his Cardiff gig. The incident took place on Saturday - the third and final night of… [+3147 chars]
